dcterms:description: A societal reactions benchmark where each image-caption pair is annotated with multiple emotions and the reasons for feeling them. It contains 18K free-form reactions for 980 emotions on 2075 image-caption pairs collected from various datasets.
dcterms:title: Socratis

dcterms:creator: Fuxiao Liu
Yinghan Wang
Tianlu Wang
Vicente Ordonez
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of images and news headlines from various news sources, used to benchmark challenges in news image captioning.
dcterms:title: Visual News

dcterms:creator: Piyush Sharma
Nan Ding
Sebastian Goodman
Radu Soricut
dcterms:description: A cleaned, hypernymed image alt-text dataset for automatic image captioning, providing a large set of image-caption pairs.
dcterms:title: Conceptual Captions

dcterms:creator: Rameswar Panda
Jianming Zhang
Haoxiang Li
Joon-Young Lee
Xin Lu
Amit K Roy-Chowdhury
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores visual emotions and addresses dataset bias, providing insights into how images can evoke emotional responses.
dcterms:title: WebEmo

dcterms:creator: Vaidehi Dalmia
Hongyi Liu
Shih-Fu Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for sentiment analysis of images, providing sentiment labels for various images.
dcterms:title: Columbia mvso image sentiment dataset

dcterms:creator: Carley Reardon
Sejin Paik
Ge Gao
Meet Parekh
Yanling Zhao
Lei Guo

dcterms:description: An affective dataset focused on gun violence news, providing emotional annotations for news articles.
dcterms:title: BU-NEmo

dcterms:creator: Jingyuan Yang
Qiruin Huang
Tingting Ding
Dani Lischinski

dcterms:description: A large-scale visual emotion dataset that includes rich attributes for various images, aimed at understanding visual emotions.
dcterms:title: Emoset
